assignadminpermissionstouser.name: AssignAdminPermissionsToUser
assignadminpermissionstouser.description: Grants permission to add AWS Supply Chain administrator permission to federated user

createbillofmaterialsimportjob.name: CreateBillOfMaterialsImportJob
createbillofmaterialsimportjob.description: Grants permission to create a BillOfMaterialsImportJob which will import a CSV file of BillOfMaterials records

createdataintegrationflow.name: CreateDataIntegrationFlow
createdataintegrationflow.description: Grants permission to create DataIntegrationFlow that can transform from multiple sources to one target

createdatalakedataset.name: CreateDataLakeDataset
createdatalakedataset.description: Grants permission to create the data lake dataset

createdatalakenamespace.name: CreateDataLakeNamespace
createdatalakenamespace.description: Grants permission to create the data lake namespace

createinstance.name: CreateInstance
createinstance.description: Grants permission to create a new AWS Supply Chain instance

createssoapplication.name: CreateSSOApplication
createssoapplication.description: Grants permission to create IAM Identity Center application for a AWS Supply Chain instance

deletedataintegrationflow.name: DeleteDataIntegrationFlow
deletedataintegrationflow.description: Grants permission to delete the DataIntegrationFlow

deletedatalakedataset.name: DeleteDataLakeDataset
deletedatalakedataset.description: Grants permission to delete the data lake dataset

deletedatalakenamespace.name: DeleteDataLakeNamespace
deletedatalakenamespace.description: Grants permission to delete the data lake namespace

deleteinstance.name: DeleteInstance
deleteinstance.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Supply Chain instance

deletessoapplication.name: DeleteSSOApplication
deletessoapplication.description: Grants permission to delete IAM Identity Center application of the AWS Supply Chain instance

describeinstance.name: DescribeInstance
describeinstance.description: Grants permission to view details of an AWS Supply Chain instance

getbillofmaterialsimportjob.name: GetBillOfMaterialsImportJob
getbillofmaterialsimportjob.description: Grants permission to view status and details of a BillOfMaterialsImportJob

getdataintegrationevent.name: GetDataIntegrationEvent
getdataintegrationevent.description: Grants permission to get a DataIntegrationEvent

getdataintegrationflow.name: GetDataIntegrationFlow
getdataintegrationflow.description: Grants permission to get the DataIntegrationFlow details

getdataintegrationflowexecution.name: GetDataIntegrationFlowExecution
getdataintegrationflowexecution.description: Grants permission to get a particular execution of one specified DataIntegrationFlow

getdatalakedataset.name: GetDataLakeDataset
getdatalakedataset.description: Grants permission to get the dataset details

getdatalakenamespace.name: GetDataLakeNamespace
getdatalakenamespace.description: Grants permission to get the namespace details

getinstance.name: GetInstance
getinstance.description: Grants permission to view details of an AWS Supply Chain instance

listadminusers.name: ListAdminUsers
listadminusers.description: Grants permission to list AWS Supply Chain administrators of an instance

listdataintegrationevents.name: ListDataIntegrationEvents
listdataintegrationevents.description: Grants permission to list all DataIntegrationEvents under an instance

listdataintegrationflowexecutions.name: ListDataIntegrationFlowExecutions
listdataintegrationflowexecutions.description: Grants permission to list all executions of one specified DataIntegrationFlow

listdataintegrationflows.name: ListDataIntegrationFlows
listdataintegrationflows.description: Grants permission to list all the DataIntegrationFlows in a paginated way

listdatalakedatasets.name: ListDataLakeDatasets
listdatalakedatasets.description: Grants permission to list the data lake datasets under specific instance and namespace

listdatalakenamespaces.name: ListDataLakeNamespaces
listdatalakenamespaces.description: Grants permission to list the data lake namespaces under specific instance

listinstances.name: ListInstances
listinstances.description: Grants permission to view the AWS Supply Chain instances associated with an AWS account

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for an AWS Supply Chain resource

removeadminpermissionsforuser.name: RemoveAdminPermissionsForUser
removeadminpermissionsforuser.description: Grants permission to remove AWS Supply Chain administrator permission from federated user

senddataintegrationevent.name: SendDataIntegrationEvent
senddataintegrationevent.description: Grants permission to create a DataIntegrationEvent which will ingest data in real-time

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag an AWS Supply Chain resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tag from an AWS Supply Chain resource

updatedataintegrationflow.name: UpdateDataIntegrationFlow
updatedataintegrationflow.description: Grants permission to update the DataIntegrationFlow

updatedatalakedataset.name: UpdateDataLakeDataset
updatedatalakedataset.description: Grants permission to update the data lake dataset

updatedatalakenamespace.name: UpdateDataLakeNamespace
updatedatalakenamespace.description: Grants permission to update the data lake namespace

updateinstance.name: UpdateInstance
updateinstance.description: Grants permission to update an AWS Supply Chain instance
